com.viaoa.web

Class OATable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.web.OATable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OAJspComponent, ComponentInterface, Serializable

    public class OATable
extends Object
implements OAJspComponent, ComponentInterface
    Ajax table component, supports binding, editors, custom event handling.
    Author:
    vvia
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
